title: India reports record-breaking 400K new daily cases; Kentucky Derby to return with crowds: Latest COVID-19 updates
content:
1. India reports record-breaking 400K new daily cases; Kentucky Derby to return with crowds: Latest COVID-19 updates  USA TODAY
  2. The latest on Covid-19 and India's worsening crisis: Live updates  CNN
  3. India's daily COVID cases top 400000 amid severe vaccine shortage | DW News  DW News

  5. While India is desperate for oxygen, its politicians deny there’s even a problem  The Guardian

localize.title: インドでは1日あたりの新規症例数が過去最高の40万件に達し、ケンタッキーダービーには大勢の観客が訪れます。COVID-19の最新情報
印度报告了破纪录的40万个每日新病例；肯塔基德比将在人群中回归。最新的COVID-19更新
印度報告了破紀錄的40萬個每日新病例；肯塔基德比將在人羣中迴歸。最新的COVID-19更新
